extension.title: THE TITLE OF YOUR EXTENSION
extension.label: THE LABEL SHOWN BELOW THE LOGO IN THE EXTENSION DIALOG (OPTIONAL: DEFAULT IS TITLE)
extension.description: DESCRIPTION OF WHAT FUNCTIONS ARE IN THIS EXTENSION (OPTIONAL: DEFAULT IS NONE)
extension.uri.help: URI TO THE ONLINE DOCUMENTATION FOR THIS EXTENSION (OPTIONAL: DEFAULT IS NONE)
extension.uri.logo: URI TO THE LOGO TO SHOW IN THE EXTENSION DIALOG AND PAGE (OPTIONAL: DEFAULT IS NONE)
extension.namespace: PREFIX TO USE FOR FUNCTIONS WHEN INVOKING (OPTIONAL: DEFAULT IS NONE)

param.name: PARAMETER_NAME
param.optional: IS PARAMETER OPTIONAL: TRUE|FALSE (OPTIONAL: DEFAULT IS FALSE)
param.default: DEFAULT VALUE IF PARAMETER IS MISSING (OPTIONAL: DEFAULT IS NIL)
